translations: [法]偷窃；夺球次数；不正当的交易；赃物（steal 的复数）
[法]偷窃；剽窃；溜走（steal 的三单形式）

phrs.translation: （感情等）渐渐控制…；渐渐弥漫；悄悄地呈现；不知不觉地袭来

sentences.sentence: So you are the one who steals my chickens!
He steals because he simply cannot stop himself.
sentences.translation: 他之所以偷窃是因为他根本无法阻止自己。

sentences.sentence: He who steals grapes may very easily steal chickens also.
sentences.translation: 他偷葡萄，也很容易能偷鸡。
